doc:
Tom Rosqui https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Rosqui 0 Thomas Francis Rosqui (June 12, 1928 – April 12, 1991) was an American character actor with extensive stage experience. Rosqui was born in Oakland, California, the son of a Portuguese mother, Sally (née Fernandes), a homemaker, and an Italian father, Thomas A. Rosqui, a traffic manager.Rosqui appeared on Broadway in Sticks and Bones and The Price, among other productions. He also appeared on television, but his most prominent role was as Corleone family bodyguard Rocco Lampone in the first two Godfather movies. Thomas_Francis_Rosqui ( June_12_,_1928 – April_12_,_1991 ) was an_American_character_actor with extensive_stage_experience . Rosqui was_born in Oakland , California , the_son of a_Portuguese_mother , Sally_(_née_Fernandes_) , a_homemaker , and an_Italian_father , Thomas_A._Rosqui , a_traffic_manager.Rosqui appeared on Broadway in Sticks_and_Bones and The_Price , among other_productions . He also appeared on television , but his_most_prominent_role was as Corleone_family_bodyguard_Rocco_Lampone in the_first_two_Godfather_movies .
